TEXT.TITLE: FIRST SOUTHERN FEDERAL <FSFA> TO CHANGE NAME
TEXT.BODY: First Southern Federal Savings and Loan Association said its board has decided to change the company's name to Altus Bank, subject to shareholder approval at the April 29 annual meeting. Reuter
